attributes.action: ban the use of silly coloured cars built on or after 1999 from mondays to fridays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Silly colour cars are an eyesore in urban Britain and should most definately be banned from all roads! Except on weekends when people should be allowed to do what they like. That would be nice. It'll also save the environment a bit too! Thanks for reading Tony.  Will

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
